FileConfiguration.description: The configuration for what files should be pulled from the source.

properties.name: Filters
properties.description: Restrictions for what files should be pulled from the source.

type.description: Restrictions for what files should be pulled from the source.

properties.name: Folders
properties.description: Identifiers for the source folders to pull all files from recursively.

type.description: Identifiers for the source folders to pull all files from recursively.

ObjectConfiguration.description: The configuration for what data should be pulled from the source.

properties.name: FirstExecutionFrom
properties.description: The start date for objects to import in the first flow run. Epoch or ISO timestamp format is supported.

type.description: The start date for objects to import in the first flow run. Epoch or ISO timestamp format is supported.

properties.name: Object
properties.description: The name of the object to pull from the data source.

type.description: The name of the object to pull from the data source.

properties.name: ScheduleExpression
properties.description: How often the data should be pulled from data source.

type.description: How often the data should be pulled from data source.

Tag.description: A label for tagging DataIntegration resources

properties.name: Key
properties.description: A key to identify the tag.

type.description: A key to identify the tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: Corresponding tag value for the key.

type.description: Corresponding tag value for the key.

properties.name: FileConfiguration
properties.description: The configuration for what files should be pulled from the source.

type.description: The configuration for what files should be pulled from the source.

properties.name: KmsKey
properties.description: The KMS key of the data integration.

type.description: The KMS key of the data integration.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the data integration.

type.description: The name of the data integration.

properties.name: ObjectConfiguration
properties.description: The configuration for what data should be pulled from the source.

type.description: The configuration for what data should be pulled from the source.

properties.name: ScheduleConfig
properties.description: The name of the data and how often it should be pulled from the source.

type.description: The name of the data and how often it should be pulled from the source.

properties.name: SourceURI
properties.description: The URI of the data source.

type.description: The URI of the data source.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags (keys and values) associated with the data integration.

type.description: The tags (keys and values) associated with the data integration.

properties.name: DataIntegrationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data integration.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data integration.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: The unique identifer of the data integration.

type.description: The unique identifer of the data integration.
